entry.title: DSL for experimenting with contracts
entry.summary: BitVM is currently in the process of developing a project that shares similarities with an existing work. The team has expressed interest in collaborating to leverage these similarities for the benefit of BitVM's project. An invitation has been extended to combine efforts and resources to enhance the development and implementation of the intended project at BitVM. For more information on the project and potential collaboration, interested parties are encouraged to visit [BitVM](https://bitvm.org/treeplusplus). This initiative reflects BitVM's commitment to fostering partnerships within the programming community to achieve shared goals and innovations.
